qas.question: What brothers have had significant classical training?
Billy Joel and Elton John have both had what type of training?
Rock and pop musicians may have degrees in what type of music?

context: Some "popular" genre musicians have had significant <a1_0>classical<a1_0/> training, such as Billy Joel, Elton John, the <a0_0>Van Halen brothers<a0_0/>, Randy Rhoads and Ritchie Blackmore. Moreover, formal training is not unique to the classical genre. Many rock and pop musicians have completed degrees in <a2_0>commercial<a2_0/> music programs such as those offered by the Berklee College of Music and many jazz musicians have completed degrees in music from universities with jazz programs, such as the Manhattan School of Music and McGill University.
